notes.text: These are all security issues fixed in the apache2-mod_uwsgi-2.0.19.1-3.10 package on the GA media of openSUSE Tumbleweed.
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The uwsgi_expand_path function in core/utils.c in Unbit uWSGI through 2.0.15 has a stack-based buffer overflow via a large directory length.
notes.title: CVE description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
